channel.title: Source wont run! Help please!
channel.description:
When ever i run any kind of source it tells me this [6/5/11 7:11 PM]: Launching Luckscape V4... [6/5/11 7:11 PM]: Exception in thread "main" [6/5/11 7:11 PM]: java.net.BindExce ption: Address already in use: bind [6/5/11 7:11 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.Net.bind(Native Method) [6/5/11 7:11 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketChannelImpl.bind(Unknown Sourc e) [6/5/11 7:11 PM]: at sun.nio.ch.ServerSocketAdaptor.bind(Unknown Source) [6/5/11 7:11 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.r egisterNew(SocketAcceptor.java:363) [6/5/11 7:11 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor.a ccess$800(SocketAcceptor.java:55) [6/5/11 7:11 PM]: at org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio.SocketAcceptor$W orker.run(SocketAcceptor.java:222) [6/5/11 7:11 PM]: at org.apache.mina.util.NamePreservingRunnable.run(NameP reservingRunnable.java:51) [6/5/11 7:11 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .
PLEASE HELP I need help really bad

close utorrent or bittorrent or shut down the port in ur router

item.title: Source wont run! Help please!
item.dc:creator: @thesickpuma3 thesickpuma3
item.description:
@thesickpuma3 wrote:

Exception in thread “main” [6/5/11 7:11 PM]: java.net.BindExce
ption: Address already in use: bind

you mustve already had that ip/port in use… you would need to close that to start a new one.

Read full topic
